title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 500.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 500.2 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part establishes criteria for selling or offering
for sale fallout shelters as defined in subdivisions 15 and 16 of section 3 of
the Defense Emergency Act, as amended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
500.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
